title: Matchsafe, "Toad", ca. 1890
markings: Illegible marks, GORHAM, and another illegible mark, all stamped on bezel, 98 stamped on interior at front and back.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: In the shape of a toad, its feet folded up against body, its belly smooth, the back textured with bumps, some green patination in crevices. Hinge attached to top of head. Head (lid) flips backwards, hinge on back. Sides of thighs have hatch marks likely intended to serve as strikers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Toad", ca. 1890.
ca. 1890. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-138.
